\definecolor{colorTaylor}{RGB}{31,119,180}

\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[
width=\figurewidth,
height=\figureheight,
% xlabel=Operation day ($t$),
xtick={0,2,4,6,8},
ymin=-9,
ymax=7,
ytick={-5,0,5},
yticklabels=\empty,
]
\addplot+[
    only marks,
    scatter,
    mark size=2pt,
    point meta=explicit symbolic, 
    fill opacity = 0.5,
    scatter/classes={ 
        MPCC={mark=diamond*,draw=colorMPCC,colorMPCC}, 
        SOC={mark=diamond*,draw=colorSOC,colorSOC},
        Taylor={mark=diamond*,draw=colorTaylor,colorTaylor}}%
]
